sections.heading: funds; depositories; authority to give bond or security
sections.text: All depositories of public money or other funds belonging to the United States, the State of Nebraska, or the political subdivisions in this state shall have full authority to give bond for the safekeeping and payment of such deposits and the a

sections.heading: bank to pledge assets for security of deposits of city of second class by contract, and such contract is binding on both parties in absence of statutory prohibition
sections.text: Luikart v. City of Aurora, 125 Neb. 263, 249 N.W. 590 (1933).
